verbose_text: Since Bag6 has been linked to potential obesity- and type 2 diabetes associated loci, and since BAG6 regulates the stability of the intrinsically unstable Rab8a-GDP-bound form (Takahashi et al., 2019), a small G protein that has been shown to be critical for insulin stimulated GLUT4 sorting to the plasma membrane, we were interested in examining the cell surface expression of GLUT4.
